document_data.name: the Watchfire Legions
document_data.mainbody: The '''Watchfire Legions''', also called the '''Orphans''', were part of the standing army of the [[efreet]] in the [[City of Brass]] on the [[Elemental Plane of Fire]].
document_data.Organization: The 40,000 efreet soldiers of the Watchfire Legions were irregulars who received military training.
document_data.Activities: Members of the Watchfire Legions usually did not serve on the field of battle. The [[Marrake al-Sidan al-Hariq ben Lazan|Sultan]] used them as secret police.
document_data.Base of Operations: The City of Brass served as the base of the Watchfire Legions.
